devdoc.details: Provides an immutable and transparent log of all user protections.

GoldenAppleActivated(address,uint256,uin.details: Emitted when a golden apple protection is activated.

params.panicScore: The panic score that contributed to the trigger.

returns._0: The most recent Protection struct or empty if none.

params.index: The index in the protections array.

returns._0: The Protection struct at that index.
An array of indices in the protections array.
An array of Protection structs for that user.

recordProtection(address,uint256,uint256.details: This function is called by our backend bot when protection conditions are met.

params.chain: The name of the chain where the risk occurred (e.g., "ethereum").
params.healthAfter: The user's health percentage after protection (e.g., 85).
params.healthBefore: The user's health percentage before protection (e.g., 58).
params.panicScore: The social sentiment panic score that triggered the event.
params.user: The address of the user being protected.

protections.details: Array storing all protection events in order.

userProtections.details: Mapping from user address to array of indices in the protections array.
